Thaddis Laphonia "Kuk" Harrell (/kuːk/ KOOK) bụ ónyé America na-ede egwu, ónyé na-emepụta olu, onye nhazi na injinia. Ọ bụ ónyé otu ndị na-ede egwu nke ya onwe ya, Christopher "Tricky" Stewart na Terius "The-Dream" Nash

N'afọ 2011, Kuk Harrell na ónyé mmekọ ya Tricky Stewart sonyeere ndị American Idol nke Fox tinyere ónyé egwu egwu Jimmy Iovine, na-emepụta ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ndị na-asọmpi na-eme na telivishọn ma wepụta ya site na iTunes
2011 gosipụtara nloghachi a na-atụ anya nke Jennifer Lopez na abọm ya LOVE? nke Kuk jere ozi dị ka onye na-emepụta egwu
N'inweta Grammy nke anọ ya maka mmepụta olu nke Rihanna's No
1 Billboard Single "Only Girl (In the World)", Harrell bụkwa onye na-emepụta olu na ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ nke Rihanna na-enweta Grammy "Umbrella"
Onye na-ede egwu na ónyé injinia na chaatị Beyoncé na-ebute "Single Ladies (Put A Ring On It) " site na album I Am..
Sasha Obi Ike, ọ bụkwa ónyé na-emepụta olu na injinia nke Diane Warren dere "I Was Here" site na album 4 nke Beyoncé na 2011
O mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime olu na Mary J
Blige's Platinum album Growing Pains, nke meriri 2008 Grammy maka Best Contemporary R&B Album
Otu egwu mbụ sitere na Growing Pains, "Just Fine", nwetara nhọpụta Grammy màkà arụmọrụ R&B kachasị mma na 2007.
